mapper.select: SELECT D.D_ID, D.D_NAME , D.D_DAM, D.D_PHONE FROM DEPT D WHERE D.D_NAME LIKE '%'||#{d_name}||'%' ORDER BY D.D_NAME ASC
SELECT e_id, e_name, e_phone, e_intro, e_indate, j_name FROM employee e join jumpo j ON e.j_id = j.j_id ORDER BY e_id asc
SELECT e_id, e_name, e_passwd, e_phone, e_intro, j_name, e_indate FROM employee e join jumpo j on e.j_id = j.j_id WHERE e_id = #{e_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO employee (e_id, e_name, e_passwd, e_intro,e_phone, j_id) VALUES (#{e_id},#{e_name},#{e_passwd},#{e_intro},#{e_phone},#{j_id})
mapper.update: UPDATE employee SET e_name=#{e_name}, e_passwd= #{e_passwd}, e_intro = #{e_intro}, e_phone = #{e_phone}, j_id = #{j_id} WHERE e_id = #{e_id}
